issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Am working on live project its working fine till yesterdays but now android 5(os) not working 
remaining all versions are working what is the root cause to know about this issue

if i run with debugging mode it showing "No Peer Certificate"
but API has certificate and working with other android OS

Please suggest the solution
fields.summary: Android 5 os not able to login or hitting the webservice

comments.body: Hello, Can you provide a test code that regenerates the issue? Usually, the issue is related to the device time and date. We need some more info like SDK version, Studio version and CLI. Thanks.
